sentences.en: In an attempt to attract more tourists, the Swiss government commissioned several life-size fiberglass cow statues, having them decorated by local artists, and set them up on the streets of Zurich.
sentences.cn: 为了吸引更多的游客，瑞士政府委托当地艺术家来装饰几尊真人大小的玻璃纤维奶牛雕像，并将它们放置在苏黎世的街道上。

sentences.en: the fiberglass chair is from modernica.
sentences.cn: 玻璃纤维椅子是modernica的产品。

sentences.en: The body is fiberglass and carbon fiber.
sentences.cn: 车身材料为玻璃纤维和碳纤维。
